name: Serum Visions
oracle_text: Draw a card. Scry 2.
flavor_text: Serum was once derived from Mirrodin's blinkmoths, offering visions of inspiration. Now it is pulled from Phyrexian inkmoths, yielding visions of perfection.

name: Ponder
oracle_text:
Look at the top three cards of your library, then put them back in any order. You may shuffle your library.
Draw a card.
flavor_text: Tomorrow belongs to those who prepare for it today.

name: Naru Meha, Master Wizard
oracle_text:
Flash
When Naru Meha, Master Wizard enters the battlefield, copy target instant or sorcery spell you control. You may choose new targets for the copy.
Other Wizards you control get +1/+1.

name: Treasure Cruise
oracle_text:
Delve (Each card you exile from your graveyard while casting this spell pays for {1}.)
Draw three cards.
flavor_text: Countless delights drift on the surface while dark schemes run below.

name: Traumatic Visions
oracle_text:
Counter target spell.
Basic landcycling {1}{U} ({1}{U}, Discard this card: Search your library for a basic land card, reveal it, put it into your hand, then shuffle your library.)

name: Brass's Bounty
oracle_text: For each land you control, create a Treasure token. (It's an artifact with "{T}, Sacrifice this artifact: Add one mana of any color.")
flavor_text:
"Why squabble for trinkets when we could be living large off all this gold?"
—Admiral Beckett Brass

name: Blasphemous Act
oracle_text:
This spell costs {1} less to cast for each creature on the battlefield.
Blasphemous Act deals 13 damage to each creature.
flavor_text:
"Holy places are no longer sanctuary from death, and death is no longer sanctuary from anything."
—Thalia, Knight-Cathar

name: Apex of Power
oracle_text:
Exile the top seven cards of your library. Until end of turn, you may cast spells from among them.
If this spell was cast from your hand, add ten mana of any one color.
flavor_text:
"As I desire, so it shall be."
—Nicol Bolas

name: Fiery Fall
oracle_text:
Fiery Fall deals 5 damage to target creature.
Basic landcycling {1}{R} ({1}{R}, Discard this card: Search your library for a basic land card, reveal it, put it into your hand, then shuffle your library.)

name: Etali, Primal Storm
oracle_text: Whenever Etali, Primal Storm attacks, exile the top card of each player's library, then you may cast any number of spells from among those cards without paying their mana costs.
flavor_text: The storm rages and the earth breaks.

name: Erratic Cyclops
oracle_text:
Trample
Whenever you cast an instant or sorcery spell, Erratic Cyclops gets +X/+0 until end of turn, where X is that spell's converted mana cost.
flavor_text:
"The League accepts no responsibility for former members and the damage they may cause."
—Maree, Izzet chamberlain

name: Dualcaster Mage
oracle_text:
Flash
When Dualcaster Mage enters the battlefield, copy target instant or sorcery spell. You may choose new targets for the copy.
flavor_text: "It has been my experience that disasters like to strike in pairs."

name: Charmbreaker Devils
oracle_text:
At the beginning of your upkeep, return an instant or sorcery card at random from your graveyard to your hand.
Whenever you cast an instant or sorcery spell, Charmbreaker Devils gets +4/+0 until end of turn.

name: Sunbird's Invocation
oracle_text: Whenever you cast a spell from your hand, reveal the top X cards of your library, where X is that spell's converted mana cost. You may cast a spell with converted mana cost X or less from among cards revealed this way without paying its mana cost. Put the rest on the bottom of your library in a random order.

name: Seething Song
oracle_text: Add {R}{R}{R}{R}{R}.
flavor_text: Vulshok mana rituals echo the day when the red sun burst through Mirrodin's surface to take its place in the heavens.

name: Mana Geyser
oracle_text: Add {R} for each tapped land your opponents control.
flavor_text: The Quicksilver Sea hissed and bubbled at the indignity. The Vulshok shaman just smiled.

name: Jaya Ballard
oracle_text:
+1: Add {R}{R}{R}. Spend this mana only to cast instant or sorcery spells.
+1: Discard up to three cards, then draw that many cards.
−8: You get an emblem with "You may cast instant and sorcery spells from your graveyard. If a spell cast this way would be put into your graveyard, exile it instead."

name: Humble Defector
oracle_text: {T}: Draw two cards. Target opponent gains control of Humble Defector. Activate this ability only during your turn.
flavor_text:
"You were once Mardu, so your body and will are strong. Now we must train your mind."
—Houn, Jeskai elder

name: Wildfire Devils
oracle_text: When Wildfire Devils enters the battlefield and at the beginning of your upkeep, choose a player at random. That player exiles an instant or sorcery card from their graveyard. Copy that card. You may cast the copy without paying its mana cost.
flavor_text: Devils sow grief and harvest glee.

name: Volcanic Vision
oracle_text: Return target instant or sorcery card from your graveyard to your hand. Volcanic Vision deals damage equal to that card's converted mana cost to each creature your opponents control. Exile Volcanic Vision.

name: Call the Skybreaker
oracle_text:
Create a 5/5 blue and red Elemental creature token with flying.
Retrace (You may cast this card from your graveyard by discarding a land card in addition to paying its other costs.)
flavor_text: It hears and answers every orison across Shadowmoor.

name: Crackling Drake
oracle_text:
Flying
Crackling Drake's power is equal to the total number of instant and sorcery cards you own in exile and in your graveyard.
When Crackling Drake enters the battlefield, draw a card.

name: Pyromancer's Goggles
oracle_text: {T}: Add {R}. When that mana is spent to cast a red instant or sorcery spell, copy that spell and you may choose new targets for the copy.
flavor_text:
"I hope to meet Jaya Ballard someday. I think we'd get along."
—Chandra Nalaar

name: Izzet Signet
flavor_text: The Izzet signet is redesigned often, each time becoming closer to a vanity portrait of Niv-Mizzet.

name: Epic Experiment
oracle_text: Exile the top X cards of your library. You may cast instant and sorcery spells with converted mana cost X or less from among them without paying their mana costs. Then put all cards exiled this way that weren't cast into your graveyard.

name: Talisman of Creativity
oracle_text:
{T}: Add {C}.
{T}: Add {U} or {R}. Talisman of Creativity deals 1 damage to you.
flavor_text:
"Good ideas don't take time. They take a lot of bad ideas first."
—Ral Zarek

name: Izzet Boilerworks
oracle_text:
Izzet Boilerworks enters the battlefield tapped.
When Izzet Boilerworks enters the battlefield, return a land you control to its owner's hand.
{T}: Add {U}{R}.

name: Desert of the Mindful
oracle_text:
Desert of the Mindful enters the battlefield tapped.
{T}: Add {U}.
Cycling {1}{U} ({1}{U}, Discard this card: Draw a card.)

name: Desert of the Fervent
oracle_text:
Desert of the Fervent enters the battlefield tapped.
{T}: Add {R}.
Cycling {1}{R} ({1}{R}, Discard this card: Draw a card.)

name: Blighted Cataract
oracle_text:
{T}: Add {C}.
{5}{U}, {T}, Sacrifice Blighted Cataract: Draw two cards.
flavor_text: Once, water ran here. Now only dust and ash fall from the clifftops.

name: Reliquary Tower
oracle_text:
You have no maximum hand size.
{T}: Add {C}.
flavor_text: Once guarded by the Knights of the Reliquary, the tower stands now protected only by its own remoteness, its dusty treasures open to plunder by anyone.

name: Memorial to Genius
oracle_text:
Memorial to Genius enters the battlefield tapped.
{T}: Add {U}.
{4}{U}, {T}, Sacrifice Memorial to Genius: Draw two cards.

name: Mage-Ring Network
oracle_text:
{T}: Add {C}.
{1}, {T}: Put a storage counter on Mage-Ring Network.
{T}, Remove any number of storage counters from Mage-Ring Network: Add {C} for each storage counter removed this way.

name: Temple of Epiphany
oracle_text:
Temple of Epiphany enters the battlefield tapped.
When Temple of Epiphany enters the battlefield, scry 1.
{T}: Add {U} or {R}.

name: Shivan Reef
oracle_text:
{T}: Add {C}.
{T}: Add {U} or {R}. Shivan Reef deals 1 damage to you.

name: Scavenger Grounds
oracle_text:
{T}: Add {C}.
{2}, {T}, Sacrifice a Desert: Exile all cards from all graveyards.
flavor_text: When the last scrap of flesh is scoured away, the Curse of Wandering ends. Then the dead may sleep.

name: Inkshield
oracle_text: Prevent all combat damage that would be dealt to you this turn. For each 1 damage prevented this way, create a 2/1 white and black Inkling creature token with flying.
flavor_text: Silverquill's elite know how to offer a scathing rebuttal without uttering a word.

name: Tempting Contract
oracle_text: At the beginning of your upkeep, each opponent may create a Treasure token. For each opponent who does, you create a Treasure token.
flavor_text:
"Don't think of it as debt. Think of it as an investment in yourself."
—Diriga, demon bursar

name: Keen Duelist
oracle_text: At the beginning of your upkeep, you and target opponent each reveal the top card of your library. You each lose life equal to the mana value of the card revealed by the other player. You each put the card you revealed into your hand.

name: Incarnation Technique
oracle_text:
Demonstrate (When you cast this spell, you may copy it. If you do, choose an opponent to also copy it.)
Mill five cards, then return a creature card from your graveyard to the battlefield.
flavor_text: "Draw out your fear, but don't let it control you. You're in charge now."

name: Fain, the Broker
oracle_text:
{T}, Sacrifice a creature: Put two +1/+1 counters on target creature.
{T}, Remove a counter from a creature you control: Create a Treasure token.
{T}, Sacrifice an artifact: Create a 2/1 white and black Inkling creature token with flying.
{3}{B}: Untap Fain, the Broker.

name: Cunning Rhetoric
oracle_text: Whenever an opponent attacks you and/or one or more planeswalkers you control, exile the top card of that player's library. You may play that card for as long as it remains exiled, and you may spend mana as though it were mana of any color to cast it.

name: Bold Plagiarist
oracle_text:
Flash
Whenever an opponent puts one or more counters on a creature they control, they put the same number and kind of counters on Bold Plagiarist.
flavor_text: "I know a good idea when I see one."

name: Author of Shadows
oracle_text: When Author of Shadows enters the battlefield, exile all cards from all opponents' graveyards. Choose a nonland card exiled this way. You may cast that card for as long as it remains exiled, and you may spend mana as though it were mana of any color to cast that spell.

name: Scholarship Sponsor
oracle_text: When Scholarship Sponsor enters the battlefield, each player who controls fewer lands than the player who controls the most lands searches their library for a number of basic land cards less than or equal to the difference, puts those cards onto the battlefield tapped, then shuffles.

name: Promise of Loyalty
oracle_text: Each player puts a vow counter on a creature they control and sacrifices the rest. Each of those creatures can't attack you for as long as it has a vow counter on it.
flavor_text: "It's us against the world. Forever."

name: Nils, Discipline Enforcer
oracle_text:
At the beginning of your end step, for each player, put a +1/+1 counter on up to one target creature that player controls.
Each creature with one or more counters on it can't attack you or planeswalkers you control unless its controller pays {X}, where X is the number of counters on that creature.

name: Guardian Archon
oracle_text:
Flying
As Guardian Archon enters the battlefield, secretly choose an opponent.
Reveal the player you chose: You and target permanent you control each gain protection from the chosen player until end of turn. Activate only once.

name: Combat Calligrapher
oracle_text:
Flyinh
Inklings can't attack you or planeswalkers you control.
Whenever a player attacks one of your opponents, that attacking player creates a tapped 2/1 white and black Inkling creature token with flying that's attacking that opponent.

name: Felisa, Fang of Silverquill
oracle_text:
Flying
Mentor (Whenever this creature attacks, put a +1/+1 counter on target attacking creature with lesser power.)
Whenever a nontoken creature you control dies, if it had counters on it, create X tapped 2/1 white and black Inkling creature tokens with flying, where X is the number of counters it had on it.
